content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at position (16.0, 0.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (16.0, 0.0) and a wooden chest at position (16.5, 1.5)

### Water Extraction and Boiler Setup at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of an Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, -0.5) and a Boiler at position (-7.0, -0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing Steam Engine
- Ensure the target location is clear of obstacles and is not part of unplaceable terrain (such as water) before attempting to place a Steam Engine.

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
